Text: can some one please help an idiot out here? the video works fine but there is abousutley no sound. Thanks in advance.
The video is using 5.1 surround.  If you are trying to play it on your computer using media player ect. you will need a plug-in to get the sound.

ahhh i know this will sound real stupid but what i really need to know is can i watch it on my computer with headphones? I did download a plugin but it required me to have 4 speakers. once again thanks in advance
Amentalmoron - Download AC3 Filter, have it running on your computer when you play with WMP and audio will come through.
